1.subtask_description: Convert the address '1600 Amphitheatre Parkway, Mountain View, CA' into geographic coordinates.

1.handles: Converts the address into geographic coordinates.

2.subtask_description: Convert the geographic coordinates back into an address to verify the accuracy of the geocoding process.

1.handles: Converts the coordinates back into an address.

output_vars.name: reverse_geocoded_address
output_vars.value: "CWF7+CQ, 1600 Amphitheatre Pkwy, Mountain View, CA 94043, USA"

3.subtask_description: Find places of interest around the geocoded location.

1.handles: Searches for places of interest around the geocoded location.

input_vars.name: query
input_vars.description: Search query for places of interest.

output_vars.name: nearby_places
output_vars.description: List of nearby places of interest.
